title:
What is the law in New Hanover County concerning picking up dog defecation? Is there a fine for not picking it up?



Thanks...
text:
There's no specific county rule that I can find, but the city has a
fairly new regulation. Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4172



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4189

If there's a serious nuisance issue, this link might also help:

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4059
